location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 3468 of 1862 from W Wedderburn, Acting Secretary to Government, Bombay to Lieutenant Colonel Lewis Pelly, Acting Political Resident, Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter enclosing an extract from a desptach No. 32, 24 September 1862 from Her Majesty's Secretary of State for India in Council.The enclosed extract is from paragraph four of the despatch and relates to reports that Colonel Pelly wrote on the Comoro Islands [Comoros Islands] which were considered to be 'interesting and valuable'.
